pr_title: v4, add common class/annotation of azure-core to reserved words

timeline.message: add common class/annotation of azure-core to reserved words
move the azure-core reserved classes to reserved for type only

timeline.bodyText:
I put a new RESERVED_WORDS_CLASSES set for types.
These class/annotation names are fine for parameter/property. They only conflict with type names.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft
